data.meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.
data.sentence: The word قَالُوا comes from the root ق و ل and is associated with the meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.

data.meanings: to track, make a tale, add apendix, follow closely, become spotted.Commit offence, fault, sin, wrong, act of disobedience, transgression.
data.sentence: The word ذُنُوبَنَا comes from the root ذ ن ب and is associated with the meanings: to track, make a tale, add apendix, follow closely, become spotted.Commit offence, fault, sin, wrong, act of disobedience, transgression.

data.meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.
data.sentence: The word كُنَّا comes from the root ك و ن and is associated with the meanings: (Kaf-Alif-Nun) To be, exist, happen, occur, take place, become, be such or so.

data.meanings: protect, cover over, shield, forgive, pardon.
data.sentence: The word اسْتَغْفِرْ comes from the root غ ف ر and is associated with the meanings: protect, cover over, shield, forgive, pardon.

data.meanings: father/grandfather/ancestor, fathership/paternity, to nourish/feed/rear, bring up.
data.sentence: The word يَاأَبَانَا comes from the root ا ب و and is associated with the meanings: father/grandfather/ancestor, fathership/paternity, to nourish/feed/rear, bring up.

data.meanings: To do wrong, commit a mistake or error, commit a sin or crime or act of disobedience for which one deserves punishment, commit a fault or offense (intentionally or unintentionally), pursue a wrong way (intentionally or otherwise), cause to miss or pass over, miss a thing (or fail of hitting it), miss or deviate from, far or out of reach, cause one to make a mistake, feign a wrong action/mistake/error.
data.sentence: The word خَاطِءِينَ comes from the root خ ط ا and is associated with the meanings: To do wrong, commit a mistake or error, commit a sin or crime or act of disobedience for which one deserves punishment, commit a fault or offense (intentionally or unintentionally), pursue a wrong way (intentionally or otherwise), cause to miss or pass over, miss a thing (or fail of hitting it), miss or deviate from, far or out of reach, cause one to make a mistake, feign a wrong action/mistake/error.
